entry.title: Ptarmigan mainnet release
entry.summary: On April 30, 2019, Hiroki Gondo of Nayuta team announced the release of their mainnet implementation, Ptarmigan. This is their recklessness version and the fourth implementation of BOLT compliance. Gondo also warns users to try this software with an amount they can afford to lose. ZmnSCPxj congratulated Gondo and hoped that many bugs would be fixed in the first mainnet release. Gondo later updated that some bugs have already been fixed after the release. The code for Ptarmigan can be found on GitHub.
